name: Toy World
description:
Prepare for a toy war in the world of toys! Because this war has no end..

Language: English
Playing Time: Forever!
Platform: PC, Android

• Hi, Welcome to the most popular toy store in the WORLD. TOY WORLD...
• Of course there are some disadvantages of being popular...
• Killer, lively, aggressive, disgusting toys roam around at night.
• That's why we lost a lot of money.
• So we found you!
• We trust in you captain..
• All you have to do..
• !! ! ! ! ! DESTROY SOME TOYS! !!! ! ! !
